snippet: An earthquake hit southern Maine on Tuesday evening, rattling New England as far as Boston and Connecticut.
abstract: Earthquake hits southern Maine, rattling New England as far as Boston and Connecticut, but with no immediate reports of damage or injuries; United States Geological Survey estimates magnitude at 4.0.
lead_paragraph: An earthquake hit southern Maine on Tuesday evening, rattling New England as far as Boston and Connecticut.

headline.main: No Damage Is Reported From a Quake in Maine
headline.print_headline: No Damage Is Reported From a Quake in Maine
